revised_title: A Study on the Tornoceratidae: Succession of Tornoceras and Related Genera in North American Devonian
tldr: This study examines the succession of Tornoceras and related ammonite genera in the North American Devonian period. It provides a detailed analysis of their ontogeny, stratigraphical distribution, and allomorphosis, shedding light on the evolution and phylogeny of the Tornoceratidae family.
